title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added clarification that repository traffic metrics are unavailable on Proxima via UI/REST API.
Introduced a new tutorial for monitoring costs using soft budgets.
Removed Gemini 2.5 Pro deprecation and updated its status to GA.
Clarified REST API billing usage reporting levels and Copilot billing scenarios.
Updated team sync usage limits documentation to clarify feature-specific constraints.
Enhanced Dependabot configuration guides with restructured content.
Added conceptual article on GitHub secret types and updated secret scanning resolution steps.
Noted build modes when filtering CodeQL analysis.
summary:

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added clarification that repository traffic metrics are unavailable on Proxima via UI/REST API.
- Introduced a new tutorial for monitoring costs using soft budgets.
- Removed Gemini 2.5 Pro deprecation and updated its status to GA.
- Clarified REST API billing usage reporting levels and Copilot billing scenarios.
- Updated team sync usage limits documentation to clarify feature-specific constraints.
- Enhanced Dependabot configuration guides with restructured content.
- Added conceptual article on GitHub secret types and updated secret scanning resolution steps.
- Noted build modes when filtering CodeQL analysis.

### Title
**Documentation updates: Clarify billing, data residency, security features, and deprecations**
